name: Me Eat Egg
description:
You Hungree. You get Egg. You not let crack. You cook. You eat.

A simple three-staged platformer where you must get the egg at the end of the level and return it back to your campfire without it getting destroyed! You must avoid ceilings and time your jumps to avoid the timed dino stomps! Will you help Hungree get his three meals for the day?

Controls

  • WASD or ARROWS to Move
  • SPACE or Z to Jump

Credits

  • Programming/Art: Paul Anthony Alicea [Website] [Twitter]
  • Art: Ian Morales
  • Music: HLG/Cold Brew

Special Thanks

  • Erik Scog and the Fight Corp Discord for hosting the game Jam
  • Freesounds for free sounds
  • Newgrounds Sound Portal for the dope SNES-y track
  • Scirra for Construct 2
  • Super Platformer Engine for the template
